name: Token space 8
description:
Stop nudging around pixels. Select what space you need and align or distribute!


Align inside

  • Choose a single layer in a frame or group and click on direction you want to align
  • Choose 2 layers. Layer on top will align to layer on back


Distribute

  • Choose multiple layers and click on direction to spread out
  • You donâ€™t need to tidy up. Just spread it out!


Roadmap

  • Ability to customize spacing and add token names
